channel.title: GolemXScape
channel.description:
[URL=http://i1309.photobucket.com/albums/s627/ogolemx/movie_zpsc9971c32.mp4][IMG]http://i1309.photobucket.com/albums/s627/ogolemx/th_movie_zpsc9971c32.jpg[/img][/URL] ^^^ click for video
so i made this rsps and i wanna get more players... so here my advertisement...
HERE ARE SOME THINGS I ADDED TO THE SERVER... -::gamble takes you to gambling area -::roll 55x2 dicing -::2roll 70x3 dicing -::3roll 85x5 dicing -::bash takes you to a boss -::christmasevent (after january 7th it will be ::quest and will give different reward) -::agsmini win ags -::dclawmini win dragon claws -::lottery (purchase a lottery ticket at ::shops) -::phatmini win partyhat set -::diceinfo -::commands -::starter -::trade trding area -::random a random place -::feast another random place -::chill chill here for fun -::afk become afk -::drags dragons teletport -::jad -::kqueen -::dp drop parties hosted here -::cg (color game -another gambling method) -::rares kill the orks for rares -::maxhit determine your maxhit -::portals teleports you the where the portals are (also the death spawn) -::home customized home -::yell -::forums -::help
mod commands -::alert (warns the player who abused) -::staff (staffzone) -::az (staffzone) -::notedbarrows (gives barrows armour) -::mod (a mod kit) -::modarm (custom mod armour -fixed item slots) -::sz2 (other staffzone) -::bank -::kick
admin commands ::master gives 99 in all stats ::pure make you have pure stats ::ipban ipban player ::xteleto tele to a player ::xteletome make a player go to you ::god fly emote ::godoff stop flying ::pnpc turn into a npc ::alltome teleport all online players to you ::die die emote ::ekick kicking emote ::2fun funny emote 2 ::drunk emote to walk drunk ::funny funny emote ::zap emote that electricutes you ::live emote that makes u look alive? ::jump emote that makes u jump like a madman ::ufloat another emote ::boo another emote ::adminarm custom admin armour with item slot fixed ::rich 2147m cash ::bunny turn into a bunny and get bunny ears
owner commands: -::oboom super huge explosion around you -::ownerarm custom owner armour with fixed item slots -::givemod -::giveadmin -::giveowner -::lupdate latest update -::announce make an announcement -::opack gives some armour -::npc spawns npc -::cool -::ozone owner only zone -::lamp gives a lit bug lantern that is valuable -::pickup
pictures!!! [img]http://i.imgur.com/iZsIe.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/52IBp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CzMID.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/G8mXe.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lrj14.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gw9zZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UvfPD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dDQTC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zrWdJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5WiFX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MpRqD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lvVA8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xjyD8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XwswA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iLZer.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FAEQZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WmRtF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cUKrE.png[/img] end pictures...
those were jut some pics of the server... join us!
fixes and other : -turn into bunny when u equip bunny ears -walk drunk when u hold bronze dagger -bronze dagger is strongest weapon ingame -turn into grim reaper when equip scythe -turn into gorilla when equip monkey gregree -do a cool emote when holding ags -funny emote when u run with bowsword in hands -added 1b tokens for the rich people -some custom staff armour -fixed some of the glitches -fixed some dupes -fixed item equip slots -i coded some auto dicers that will host dice games for you. All 50x2 and 50% chance. -lots of exiting things to do -fixed teleglitch -fixed teleglitch where u noclip -added custom player titles -fixed trade dupe -added modglow adminglow and ownerglow -lots of cool new things hat u might not have ever seen on an allstar
THOSE are only some of the things i have added to the server there is much more, so come check us out at :
www.golemxscape.smffy.com
thank you for reading. -The owner OF GolemXScape -Owner GolemX

item.title: GolemXScape
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

OGolemX:

added like 40 new customs

Mygod your acting like shit loads of customs are good in a server…
Maybe it is for allstar but i personally dislike it.

Dokan42:

Not one person is going to join if its hamachi… just throwing that out there.

True hamachi = crap its fine if you only want to play with friends but for hosting its CRAP.
If you need me to portforward for you then add me on skype.

Read full topic

item.title: GolemXScape
item.dc:creator: @GolemXScape GolemXScape
item.description:
@GolemXScape wrote:


^^^ click for video

so i made this rsps and i wanna get more players… so here my advertisement…

HERE ARE SOME THINGS I ADDED TO THE SERVER…
-::gamble takes you to gambling area
-::roll 55x2 dicing
-::2roll 70x3 dicing
-::3roll 85x5 dicing
-::bash takes you to a boss
-::christmasevent (after january 7th it will be ::quest and will give different reward)
-::agsmini win ags
-::dclawmini win dragon claws
-::lottery (purchase a lottery ticket at ::shops)
-::phatmini win partyhat set
-::diceinfo
-::commands
-::starter
-::trade trding area
-::random a random place
-::feast another random place
-::chill chill here for fun
-::afk become afk
-::drags dragons teletport
-::jad
-::kqueen
-::dp drop parties hosted here
-::cg (color game -another gambling method)
-::rares kill the orks for rares
-::maxhit determine your maxhit
-::portals teleports you the where the portals are (also the death spawn)
-::home customized home
-::yell
-::forums
-::help

mod commands
-::alert (warns the player who abused)
-::staff (staffzone)
-::az (staffzone)
-::notedbarrows (gives barrows armour)
-::mod (a mod kit)
-::modarm (custom mod armour -fixed item slots)
-::sz2 (other staffzone)
-::bank
-::kick

admin commands
::master gives 99 in all stats
::pure make you have pure stats
::ipban ipban player
::xteleto tele to a player
::xteletome make a player go to you
::god fly emote
::godoff stop flying
::pnpc turn into a npc
::alltome teleport all online players to you
::die die emote
::ekick kicking emote
::2fun funny emote 2
::drunk emote to walk drunk
::funny funny emote
::zap emote that electricutes you
::live emote that makes u look alive?
::jump emote that makes u jump like a madman
::ufloat another emote
::boo another emote
::adminarm custom admin armour with item slot fixed
::rich 2147m cash
::bunny turn into a bunny and get bunny ears

owner commands:
-::oboom super huge explosion around you
-::ownerarm custom owner armour with fixed item slots
-::givemod
-::giveadmin
-::giveowner
-::lupdate latest update
-::announce make an announcement
-::opack gives some armour
-::npc spawns npc
-::cool
-::ozone owner only zone
-::lamp gives a lit bug lantern that is valuable
-::pickup

pictures!!!

iZsIe.png783×540

52IBp.png782×540

CzMID.png784×540

G8mXe.png781×540


gw9zZ.png784×543

UvfPD.png781×537

dDQTC.png782×538

zrWdJ.png777×538

5WiFX.png784×541

MpRqD.png783×540

lvVA8.png780×538


XwswA.png783×542

iLZer.png785×543

FAEQZ.png785×539

WmRtF.png781×540

cUKrE.png786×542

end pictures…

those were jut some pics of the server…
join us!

fixes and other :
-turn into bunny when u equip bunny ears
-walk drunk when u hold bronze dagger
-bronze dagger is strongest weapon ingame
-turn into grim reaper when equip scythe
-turn into gorilla when equip monkey gregree
-do a cool emote when holding ags
-funny emote when u run with bowsword in hands
-added 1b tokens for the rich people
-some custom staff armour
-fixed some of the glitches
-fixed some dupes
-fixed item equip slots
-i coded some auto dicers that will host dice games for you. All 50x2 and 50% chance.
-lots of exiting things to do
-fixed teleglitch
-fixed teleglitch where u noclip
-added custom player titles
-fixed trade dupe
-added modglow adminglow and ownerglow
-lots of cool new things hat u might not have ever seen on an allstar

THOSE are only some of the things i have added to the server there is much more, so come check us out at :

www.golemxscape.smffy.com

thank you for reading.
-The owner OF GolemXScape
-Owner GolemX

Read full topic
